sentence: REMEMBER, Brian Kemp will never be able to win the General Election against Stacey The Hoax' Abrams because a large number of Republicans just will not vote for him.? Earlier this week, Judge Amy Totenberg, an Obama appointee, ruled that a legal challenge against Greene's candidacy by a group of Georgia voters could move forward.
author: Caroline Vakil
title: Trump lashes out at Georgia officials over effort to remove Greene from ballot
